member.name: IDCompositionBrightnessEffect.SetBlackPoint
member.summary: Specifies the lower portion of the brightness transfer curve for the brightness effect.
member.param: The lower portion of the brightness transfer curve. The black point adjusts the appearance of the darker portions of the image. The vector is for both the x value and the y value, in that order. Each of the values must be between 0 and 1, inclusive.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDCompositionBrightnessEffect.SetBlackPointX
member.summary: Sets the x value of the black point.
member.param: The x value of the black point.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDCompositionBrightnessEffect.SetBlackPointX
member.summary: Sets the x value of the black point.
member.param: An animation that represents how the x value of the black point changes over time. This parameter must not be NULL.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDCompositionBrightnessEffect.SetBlackPointY
member.summary: Sets the y value of the black point.
member.param: The y value of the black point.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDCompositionBrightnessEffect.SetBlackPointY
member.summary: Sets the y value of the black point.
member.param: An animation that represents how the y value of the black point changes over time. This parameter must not be NULL.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDCompositionBrightnessEffect.SetWhitePoint
member.summary: Sets the upper portion of the brightness transfer curve.
member.param: The upper portion of the brightness transfer curve. The white point adjusts the appearance of the brighter portions of the image. This vector is for both the x value and the y value, in that order. Each of the values must be between 0 and 1, inclusive.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDCompositionBrightnessEffect.SetWhitePointX
member.summary: Sets the x value of the white point.
member.param: The x value of the white point. This value must be between 0 and 1.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDCompositionBrightnessEffect.SetWhitePointX
member.summary: Sets the x value of the white point.
member.param: An animation that represents how the x value of the white point changes over time. This parameter must not be NULL.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDCompositionBrightnessEffect.SetWhitePointY
member.summary: Sets the y value of the white point.
member.param: The y value of the white point.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDCompositionBrightnessEffect.SetWhitePointY
member.summary: Sets the y value of the white point.
member.param: An animation that represents how the y value of the white point changes over time. This parameter must not be NULL.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDCompositionBrightnessEffect
member.summary: The brightness effect controls the brightness of the image.
